Rule.Name: Breath Weapon
Rule.Format: breath weapon (60-ft. cone, 8d6 fire damage, Reflex DC 20 for half, usable every 1d4 rounds)
Rule.Location: Special Attacks; if the breath is more complicated than damage, it also appears under Special Abilities with its own entry

Rule.Name: Change Shape
Rule.Location: SQ, and in Special Abilities for creatures with a unique listing

Rule.Name: Curse
Rule.Format: Curse Name (Su) Slam—contact; save Will DC 14, frequency 1 day, effect 1d4 Str drain

Rule.Name: Disease
Rule.Format: Disease Name (Ex) Bite—injury; save Fort DC 15, onset 1d3 days, frequency 1 day, effect 1 Con damage, cure 2 consecutive saves

Rule.Name: Poison
Rule.Format: Poison Name (Ex) Sting—injury; save Fort DC 22, frequency 1/round for 6 rounds, effect 1d4 Con, cure 2 consecutive saves
Rule.Location: Location: Special Attacks and individual attacks

Rule.Name: Rock Throwing
Rule.Location: Special Attacks (damage is listed in Ranged attack)

Rule.Name: Swallow Whole
Rule.Format: swallow whole (5d6 acid damage, AC 15, 18 hp)

Rule.Name: Combat Actions and Attacks of Opportunity
Saving Throws Against Magic Item Powers
